resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77772</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77772</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c2232882-be9b-4639-bd25-2bae44650936#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A partközeli területek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en">Living world of areas in shore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Welt von Bereichen im Ufer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde vivant des zones dans le rivage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo vivo das áreas na costa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo vivente delle zone in puntello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος διαβίωσης των περιοχών στην ακτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo vivo de áreas en orilla</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tengerek partközeli területeinek élővilága - életfeltételek a partközeli területeken; szivacsok, csalánozók, porcos és csontos halak, cetek (bálnák, delfinek); korallszirtek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en">Living world of seas' in shore-areas - essential condition in areas in shore; sponges, cnidaria, gristly and bony fish, whales (right whales, dolphins); living world of coral reefs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">biom,  tengerek,  óceánok,  partközeli területek,  </string>
            <string language="en">biome, seas, oceans, areas in shore</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Welt von Meeren in den 
Unterstützenbereichen - wesentlicher Zustand in den Bereichen im 
Ufer; des cnidaria, gristly und knöchernen Fisch der Schwämme,
Wale (rechte Wale, Delphine); lebende Welt der Korallenriffe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde vivant des mers dans les étayer-zones - 
état essentiel dans les zones dans le rivage ; poisson 
d'éponges, de cnidaria, cartilagineux et osseux, baleines (baleines, 
dauphins droits) ; monde vivant des récifs de corail</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo vivo dos mares nas suport-áreas - 
condição essencial nas áreas na costa; peixe das esponjas, do
cnidaria, o gristly e o ósseo, baleias (baleias, golfinhos direitos);
mundo vivo dos recifes corais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo vivente dei mari nelle puntell-zone - stato 
essenziale nelle zone in puntello; pesce gristly ed ossuto delle
spugne, di cnidaria, balene (balene, delfini di destra); mondo 
vivente dei reefs di corallo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος διαβίωσης των θαλασσών στις ακτή-περιοχές - 
ουσιαστικός όρος στις περιοχές στην ακτή  σφουγγάρια, 
cnidaria, gristly και κοκκαλόψαρα, φάλαινες (σωστές 
φάλαινες, δελφίνια)  κόσμος διαβίωσης των κοραλλιογενών 
υφάλων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo vivo de los mares en apuntalar-a'reas - 
condición esencial en áreas en orilla; pescado de las 
esponjas, del cnidaria, gristly y huesudo, ballenas (ballenas, 
delfines derechos); mundo vivo de los filones coralinos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biome, Meere, Ozeane, Bereiche im Ufer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biome, mers, océans, zones dans le rivage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biome, mares, oceanos, áreas na costa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biome, mari, oceani, zone in puntello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">biome, θάλασσες, ωκεανοί, περιοχές στην ακτή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">biome, mares, océanos, áreas en orilla</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77772</entry>
    </identifier>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
